channel.title: [PI] ISSUE | Certain parts of the world don't load
channel.description:
When I go to godwars, it's just a black screen with all the NPC's that are always there! Is it a problem with the cache? Or the client/Source?
I don't wanna use another source because I heavily coded this one to my liking and godwars doesn't load
If you know the solution, please message me on skype skype: tonebawsjinx
*PS* I need to fix this ASAP as I plan on releasing the BETA :D

item.title: [PI] ISSUE | Certain parts of the world don't load
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

mousamsh:

How would I add the maps? Never had this problem before so I don’t really know how to deal with it

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/281926-cache-packing-all-508-maps-no-bugs.html
Something like that should tell you how to do it, it may not have the downloads so you might have to find another link for it.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ISSUE | Certain parts of the world don't load
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

mousamsh:

Would any client that PI work?

There are no “PI clients” PI is a server base. Not a client.
There are PI compatible clients, millions in fact.

You could also just add the maps…

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] ISSUE | Certain parts of the world don't load
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“mousamsh, post:3, topic:545413”]The thing is I like it a lot! I coded it quite heavily

All that would be for nothing if I were to go to another source[/quote]

You have three options. Find a different client to play on, find out what’s wrong with the map data and fix it, or get a new source.

Read full topic
